text: at a glitzy launch this morning it was
described as the biggest reimagining of
sky TV in our history but what is sky
cue besides a flashy new touch remote
and a bunch of new boxes well here's
Andrew Olson director of new products
for Sky give us the lowdown on sky queue
sure
sky queue is a new family of products
that reimagines how we watch TV it's
really the next generation of TV your
favorite TV now can follow you from
screen to screen from room to room and
with our new future Q sync to save your
recordings to your tablet it can even
follow you from place to place now
there's a whole bunch of rival products
out there in the market there are things
like Netflix if you want a much cheaper
service than sky there are Apple TV
Amazon fire Google chromecast all of
them offering a much cheaper version of
this why why would people pay so much
money for this so what we found is that
customers love all the breadth of TV
that Sky offers with Sky Plus today but
there's a whole range of customers that
want the best possible TV experience and
what we've done is to bring even more to
that experience than ever before what
you're saying is there's a whole bunch
of people out there who want to pay even
more for television when the evidence is
surely that people are finding ways of
paying a bit less we do think there are
people who want that premium experience
at Sky Q is going to bring and to take
those most personal recordings and take
them away with you with Q sync
